title: Kitizu Paradaisu
overview: Hello Kitty has finally arrived! Kitty and her twin sister Mimi want to share their fascinating adventure with you and her entire family. Kitty and Mimi are 32 fascinating and hilarious stories that teach you a lot of fun, as well as how to share, for example, the importance of manners and how to drive safely. After each story, a game full of whimsical numbers, connect dots, find out what it is, and countless other fun employees are waiting for you!
